adHeader: DO YOU HAVE JUNK YOU NEED REMOVED
adDetails: Full size pickup truck with tie straps . Need help getting something moved or delivered, give me a call. Furniture, appliances, motorcycles and just about anything else. IKEA and other store pickups also. Man and a truck.So if you have 1 or 12 peices i can do it for you..................................... Bay area show contact info MACK NO EMAILS PLEASE I also do hauling in case you need something took to the dump or to be donated...
